hero.title: About Shiv Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1993
hero.description: Shiv Brass has been a pioneering force in precision component manufacturing for three decades, delivering high-quality brass components to the automobile and aerospace industries. Our commitment to innovation and quality has made us a trusted partner for complex manufacturing solutions.

meta.title: Shiv Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision brass component manufacturer with 30 years of experience serving automobile and aerospace industries with cutting-edge manufacturing solutions.

cta.title: Partner with Manufacturing Excellence
cta.subtitle: Transform your precision component requirements with our advanced manufacturing capabilities

items.title: Company Foundation
items.description: Established with a vision to provide high-precision brass components for critical industrial applications

items.title: First Major Expansion
items.description: Expanded manufacturing facilities and invested in advanced CNC machinery

items.title: ISO Certification Achievement
items.description: Obtained first ISO 9001 certification, establishing rigorous quality management systems

items.title: Aerospace Sector Entry
items.description: Successfully developed precision components for aerospace industry, expanding market reach

items.title: Technology Modernization

items.title: Advanced CNC Machining Center
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machining capabilities for complex brass component manufacturing

items.content: Shiv Brass is a leading precision brass component manufacturer with 30 years of expertise serving automobile and aerospace industries. We specialize in producing high-quality, complex brass components using advanced manufacturing technologies and rigorous quality control processes.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise brass alloy selection based on component requirements and industry standards

items.title: Precision Manufacturing
items.description: Advanced CNC machining and turning processes for complex component production

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Comprehensive multi-stage quality inspection using advanced metrology equipment

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Advanced surface finishing techniques including polishing and protective coating

items.title: Packaging and Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and efficient logistics ensuring safe component transportation
